examples.text: (Beni asfar) denilen sarı renkli bir kavmin, âhır zamanda Meşriktan Mağrıba kadar hâkimiyet kazanacaklarına dair de, eski kitaplarda kuvvetli rivayeler vardır.

glosses: Maghreb (the predominantly Arabic-speaking geographic region comprising northwest Africa, particularly the region of Africa north of the Sahara and west of the Nile; the coastal plains of Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, and western Libya)

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish مغرب (maġrib), from Arabic مَغْرِب (maḡrib).
